roleset.name: format again, re-editing the layout of text/data

example.name: arg1
example.text: As far as Facebook , I do n't think anyone wants to actually like it , so you 're not really all that different expressing your dislike for facebook , but you know damn well the creation and reformattings of it have been very keen to human perceptions and relations .

example.name: args 1, 2, 3
example.text: The image is from the cover of the historically significant first issue of The Mighty Thor upon its reformatting from Journey into Mystery
